Burning Hammer: Well, I can agree with you, I will never get caught, I will
never get killed, and I will catch those 3 prey items that escaped from me!
Well, there's the base, beauty, huh? I'm glad to be on the wining team, it
means more wealth for myself and the death of my enemies, since they aren't
on the Alliance's side. It would be fun to stand and watch your enemies die,
this one punk, who thought he could take me, I still need to catch him, i
only got his arm last time. And this big thing, tried to eat me, but I
cleaved out his throat! Those are my enemies. I don't mean to brag
but....aww, hell, I DO mean to brag! Haahahaah!...
